articles.title: Queen Elizabeth playfully trolled American tourists who didnt recognize her - Geo News
articles.description: Queen Elizabeth had a run-in with some tourists who were unaware of who they were speaking to
articles.content:
Queen Elizabeth is without a doubt one of the most famous public figures across the globe.

articles.title: Meggitt agrees £6.3bn takeover by Parker Hannifin - Financial Times
articles.description: Company’s shares surge to record high after latest move from an American buyer targeting a British group
articles.content:
UK aerospace and defence company Meggitt is to be taken over by US rival Parker Hannifin in a £7.1bn deal that marks the latest approach for a UK listed company by an overseas buyer.

articles.title: House Speaker Pelosi And Democratic Leaders Call On Biden To Extend Eviction Ban - NPR
articles.description: House Democratic leaders called the extension a "moral imperative" to prevent Americans from being put out of their homes during a COVID-19 surge. Some 3.6 billion Americans are at risk of eviction.
articles.content:
People from a coalition of housing justice groups hold signs protesting evictions during a news conference outside the Statehouse on Friday in Boston.
